wikipedia_page.main:
Lt. Col Frederick Henry Cardozo MC (1 December 1916 – 7 October 2011) was a British soldier and SOE veteran. Cardozo was brought up in the Loire Valley between 1923 and 1933.
In 1949 Cardozo married Simone Bigot - they had two children - one of whom, Col. Geoffrey Cardozo MBE CBE, is the secretary of the veterans charity, Veterans Aid. At the time of his birth, his father Charles was the commander of a local army garrison, having been wounded in 1915, at the battle of Loos.
In recognition of his work for the French resistance, Cardozo was awarded both the Legion of Honour and the Croix de Guerre.

response: *Frederick Cardozo – WWII soldier and SOE veteran
*Frederick Cardozo, 94, British soldier and SOE veteran.
He is credited elsewhere for recruiting Frederick Cardozo into the SOE while on training exercises in Scotland in 1943.

* PETER-79A / IAM MISSION - BENJOIN: Frederick Cardozo (SOE-F), Bernard Gouy, Jean Trollet and Jacques Lebaigue (OSS)  dropped on DZ Plongeon-1 near La Vesseyre, Cantal on 7 May 1944. Objective - an Inter Allied Mission to arm the Résistance in the Cantal départment.
* (UNKNOWN-6): Jean Edgard Pitre, Frederick Cardozo, Bernard Gouy, Jacques Lebaigue and Jean Trollet dropped on DZ Veilleuse near Deux Verges, Cantal on 11 August 1944.
He is the son of Frederick Cardozo, a British Soldier and SOE veteran. He also was Secretary of Veterans Aid.
